headline: Global Executive/CPO & Chief talent officer/Talent Strategy & Transformative leader
summary:
Global thought leader, advisor and strategist with an exceptional track record of talent transformation & innovation while building & nurturing hyper productive inclusive teams.
An experienced talent acquisition leader who has spent the entirety of his career within the recruiting function, leading global scaling within the digital engineering services space.Well-versed in leveraging technology & analytics for greater recruiting efficiency and best practices in the areas of workforce planning, capacity management, funnel metrics, automation, assessments,He thrives in working within a global, fast-paced, high-growth environment.

headline: Partner, True Ventures
summary:
I am an investor in early/seed stage technology ventures.

My areas of current entrepreneurial and investment interest are: Hardware, Science & Biology, Robotics, and Industrial Automation.

headline: Building Kanmon
summary: I like doing things. Occasional blogger @ https://blog.thesharmas.org Twitter: @rnsharma
skills: ['Product Management', 'Business Case Preparation', 'Agile Project Management', 'Product Development', 'Financial Analysis', 'Software Project Management', 'Website test and learn optimization', 'Sales Funnel Optimization', 'Entrepreneurship', 'Project Finance', 'internet marketing', 'Web Services API', 'Testing', 'Websites', 'Scrum', 'Business Case', 'Cross-functional Team Leadership', 'Enterprise Software', 'SaaS', 'R']
experiences:
[{'title': 'Co-Founder', 'company': 'Kanmon', 'starts_at': '2021'}, {'title': 'Product Growth and Retention, GM', 'company': 'Plastiq', 'description': "I am responsible for revenue from existing users for the core Payor product (retention) and new users (growth) for the Accept product with a cross functional team of AE's and AM's (Sales), Marketers (Email) and Product and Engineering. 
 
Plastiq makes it possible for business owners and savvy consumers to use a credit card for virtually any expense, even ones like rent or inventory, that normally require a check. With Plastiq, it’s easier to manage your cash flow, earn credit card rewards, tap early-payment discounts, and use your cash in the ways that make the most sense for you. Plastiq is backed by world class Investors including Kleiner Perkins, B-Capital group, Khosla Ventures and Bling Capital", 'starts_at': '2019', 'ends_at': '2021'}, {'title': 'Fellow', 'company': 'On Deck', 'starts_at': '2020', 'ends_at': '2020'}, {'title': 'VP, Product Management and Design', 'company': 'Funding Circle US', 'description': "Funding Circle is the leading global marketplace for small business loans. We help investors lend money to great small businesses looking for fast and affordable financing to grow, create new jobs, and ultimately accelerate economic growth. 

First Product/Engineering Management hire at seed round start-up (Endurance Lending Network) which was then acquired by Funding Circle. Led team post-acquisition through building out the customer products and technology platform. Along the way, I've hired and scaled the product and design team across San Francisco, London, and Berlin and grew (and continue to grow) the business significantly (56X+ growth, current loan origination $9.5B+ globally). The products that I’ve led have enabled us to grow to over 1000 employees globally, serve our customers in five countries, go public on the London Stock Exchange, with an engineering team of over 300 across five offices and two continents. 

My global team and I have built, from scratch, the entire gamut of consumer (Web, Mobile) and enterprise (API) products for small businesses, strategic partners and investors (retail and large institutions). Along the way, we have also built a highly automated marketplace and data platform that handles the huge volume of realtime transactions that drives our scale.
